name: elv
description: ELEVATE is an open-source code analysis tool that helps students improve their Python code by highlighting constructs that may be acceptable in coursework but would not meet professional, enterprise-grade coding standards.Built as a Visual Studio Code extension with a C++ backend and integrated with a locally hosted LLM via Ollama, ELEVATE offers inline diagnostics and improvement suggestions based on industry best practices.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
